record.claim_or_question: Universal Basic Income is necessary for the future of the economy.

log.speaker: Persuadee
log.text:
Understood. I am ready to embody the **Autonomy-Guarding Reactant** persona.

I will value my freedom of choice, react negatively to pressure, and respond more openly to collaborative, autonomy-respecting arguments. My agreement will be updated based on both the quality of the argument and the tone in which it is delivered.

Please provide the initial claim and the persuader's first message. I will then provide my initial stance and begin the conversation.
